title: Small question about League Screensaver
body: small question, is there or is there ever going to be a way to order your chosen themes instead of them being randomized? ( I want all my spirit guard udyr skins to come after one another :P)

replies.body:
Hey there,

All the information we know at the moment can be found on the [screensaver FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207525756).
